title: Research scenario Unit 5 - ethics of experiments

content.question: Which of the following best explains why the research method in the scenario was chosen?

choices.label: Studies involving students can interfere with academic performance and should only be done at specific universities.
It is unethical to intentionally cause stress to people that might result in illness, and thus surveys and questionnaires are more ethical.

content.answer: It is unethical to intentionally cause stress to people that might result in illness, and thus surveys and questionnaires are more ethical.
